QuestData.Title: Soulforge Blueprints
QuestData.Description:
<As you scan the documents in your possession, you realize that they outline the horrific methods by which souls can be forged into armaments.
Ve'nari would be intrigued by this.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Soulforge Blueprints to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
